full_text: Looking for the perfect stylish yet functional accessory? The Cable Crossbody Bag knitting pattern features a gorgeous cable center panel on both the front and back, with a sleek, modern shape created by simple raglan-style make-one increases along the sides. This bag is knit using KnitPicks CotLin , a durable cotton-linen blend, making it sturdy enough for everyday use while still being soft to the touch. Features: Yarn : KnitPicks CotLin Construction : Cable center panel with raglan-style increases for shaping Optional Lining : Add a sewn cloth lining with a zipper for a polished, professional finish Customizable Strap : Attach any purse strap of your choice (I used a strap from Amazon , but fabric or chain options would work too!) This versatile free knit bag pattern is perfect for everyday use, whether you’re running errands or heading out for a casual day out. It’s a fun and quick project that you can easily customize with your favorite yarn color and strap style. Difficulty Level : Intermediate (due to the cable panel and optional lining) Link to Free Pattern Don’t forget to share your finished bag on social media with #CrossbodyBagKnits and tag me @knitinthewomb—I’d love to see how you style yours!
name: Ravelry: Cable Crossbody Bag pattern by Amanda Morse
